item.title: 据说 JX Metals 首次公开募股的定价在市场范围的上限
item.description: 一位熟悉内情的人士表示，JX Advanced Metals Corp. 的首次公开募股定价在市场定价范围的上限，这是自软银公司 2018 年上市以来日本最大的首次公开募股。【原文：JX Advanced Metals Corp.’s initial public offering was priced at the upper end of the marketed range, a person familiar with the matter said, making it Japan’s biggest IPO since SoftBank Corp. went public in 2018.】

item.title: 印尼因预算压力考虑提高矿工税
item.description: 印度尼西亚正在提议提高矿工支付的特许权使用费，以加强因总统普拉博沃-苏比安托的支出计划而捉襟见肘的公共财政。【原文：Indonesia is proposing hiking royalties paid by miners in a bid to bolster public finances that are being strained by President Prabowo Subianto’s spending plans.】

item.title: 投资者回避风险，亚洲新兴货币随股市下跌
item.description: 印度卢比领跌亚洲货币，在风险情绪普遍回落的情况下与股市同步走软。【原文：The Indian rupee led Asian currencies lower, weakening in tandem with stocks amid a broader pullback in risk sentiment.】

item.title: 印度顶级制药商太阳公司将以 3.55 亿美元收购美国肿瘤公司
item.description: 太阳制药工业有限公司已同意以 3.55 亿美元的预付款收购美国免疫疗法和肿瘤公司 Checkpoint Therapeutics Inc.【原文：Sun Pharmaceutical Industries Ltd. has agreed to buy US-based immunotherapy and oncology firm Checkpoint Therapeutics Inc. for an upfront payment of $355 million, as India’s largest drugmaker bolsters its specialty therapy portfolio.】

item.title: 计划制造飞行汽车和仿人机器人，新朋股份股价大涨
item.description: 新鹏公司董事长表示，该公司计划在 2026 年前开始量产飞行汽车模型和工业机器人，随后该公司股价上涨。【原文：Xpeng Inc. shares rose after the company’s chairman said it plans to start mass production of its flying car model and industrial robots by 2026.】

item.title: 中国数据疲软和美国关税不确定性导致金属下跌
item.description: 由于投资者正努力应对特朗普政府关税带来的不确定性，工业金属全线下跌，而中国经济疲软的迹象则使全球经济增长前景更加暗淡。【原文：Industrial metals declined across the board as investors grapple with the uncertainty of the Trump administration’s tariffs, while signs of weakness in China’s economy added to the murky outlook for global growth.】

item.title: 法院重启控制权争夺战，韩国锌业股价大涨
item.description: 韩国锌业公司（Korea Zinc Co.）周一股价大涨，因为首尔一家法院宣布该公司 1 月份投资者会议上做出的包括董事会任命在内的重要决定无效，并重新引发了一场长达数月的控制权争夺战。【原文：Korea Zinc Co. shares surged on Monday after a Seoul court nullified key decisions from the company’s January investor meeting, including board appointments, and reignited a months-long battle for control.】

item.title: 中国在贸易战中将食品作为影响大、成本低的武器进行部署
item.description: 中国对一系列美国农产品征收的关税已正式生效，这是世界前两大经济体之间正在展开的贸易战中的最新报复行动。【原文：Chinese tariffs on a slew of American farm products have officially come into effect, the latest retaliation in the unfolding trade war between the world’s top two economies.】

item.title: 印度央行的中枢政策促使投资者押注印度债券收益
item.description: 投资者押注印度央行今年将采取更多的降息措施来推动经济发展，从而为印度债券的反弹做好了准备。【原文：Investors are positioning for a rally in Indian bonds on bets the central bank will go for more interest-rate cuts this year to power the economy.】

item.title: 股市暴跌，喜欢冒险的韩国人在杠杆 ETF 上损失惨重
item.description: 美国科技股的突然暴跌对韩国的母婴投资者造成了打击，这些投资者在科技股上投入了数十亿美元的杠杆赌注。【原文：A sudden swoon in US tech stocks is dealing a blow to South Korea’s mom-and-pop investors who have placed billions of dollars of leveraged bets on the cohort.】

item.title: 投资者担忧全球经济前景，黄金大幅上涨
item.description: 由于对全球经济前景的担忧加剧，避险需求升温，黄金攀升，延续了一周来的升势。【原文：Gold climbed — building on a weekly advance — as rising concerns about the global economic outlook fanned haven demand.】

item.title: ServiceNow即将达成收购人工智能助理制造商Moveworks的交易
item.description: 知情人士透露，ServiceNow 公司即将达成收购人工智能公司 Moveworks 的交易，这将是该公司迄今为止最大的一笔收购。【原文：ServiceNow Inc. is nearing a deal to buy artificial intelligence firm Moveworks, people familiar with the matter said, in what would be its largest acquisition to date.】

item.title: 中国对加拿大征收报复性关税，油菜籽价格暴跌
item.description: 北京对加拿大菜籽油和菜粕征收关税，以报复北美国家对中国制造的电动汽车、钢材和铝材征税。【原文：Canola slid by the exchange limit after Beijing slapped tariffs on Canadian rapeseed oil and meal in retaliation to the North American nation’s levies on Chinese-made electrics vehicles, steel and aluminum.】

item.title: 特朗普称四家不同集团参与 TikTok 交易
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）周日表示，他正在就 TikTok 的美国业务与四个不同的可能买家进行谈判，"很快 "就会就这款社交视频应用达成交易。【原文：President Donald Trump said Sunday he was negotiating with four different possible buyers for TikTok’s US business and that a deal for the social video app could come “soon.”】

item.title: 英国薪酬增长创四年新低，雇主为税收打击做好准备
item.description: 据英国央行密切关注的一项调查显示，由于企业在就业成本即将上涨之前争相削减开支，2月份英国新员工工资的增长速度为四年来最慢。【原文：Wages for new hires in the UK rose at the slowest pace in four years in February as businesses scrambled to cut expenses ahead of a looming hike in employment costs, according to a survey closely watched by the Bank of England.】

item.title: 新加坡和香港面临美国对华关税战带来的增长风险
item.description: 彭博社调查的中位数显示，由于美国总统唐纳德-特朗普对中国出口产品征收更高关税的不确定性增加，经济学家下调了新加坡和香港今年下半年的经济增长前景。【原文：Economists lowered the growth outlook for Singapore and Hong Kong in the second half of this year on increased uncertainties from US President Donald Trump imposing higher tariffs on China’s exports, according to the median of a Bloomberg survey.】

item.title: 投资者抛售印尼股票，普拉博沃施展市场力量
item.description: 在印尼的企业版图中，权力的空前积累加剧了投资者对东南亚最大股票市场的政治影响力和透明度的担忧。【原文：An unprecedented accumulation of power in Indonesia’s corporate landscape is fueling investor concern about political influence and transparency in Southeast Asia’s biggest equity market.】

item.title: 中国对美国农产品征收报复性关税周一生效
item.description: 中国对一系列美国农产品征收高达 15% 的关税，这可能会加剧世界两大经济体之间的贸易争端。【原文：Chinese tariffs as high as 15% on a range of US agricultural goods take effect Monday, potentially exacerbating a trade dispute between the world’s two largest economies.】

item.title: 我们可以掌握自己的经济命运卡尼胜利演讲要点
item.description: 加拿大自由党选举前央行行长马克-卡尼（Mark Carney）接替贾斯汀-特鲁多（Justin Trudeau），在面临美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）的经济和主权威胁时领导加拿大。【原文：Canada’s Liberal Party elected former central banker Mark Carney to succeed Justin Trudeau and lead the country as it faces economic and sovereignty threats from US President Donald Trump.】

item.title: 日本实现 32 年来最快基本工资增长，促进日本央行发展
item.description: 日本工人的基本工资以 32 年来最快的速度增长，这一结果向日本央行发出了积极的信号，因为日本央行正在权衡需求驱动型经济增长的前景。【原文：Japan’s workers saw their base pay rise at the fastest clip in 32 years, a result that sends a positive signal to the Bank of Japan as it weighs the prospects for demand-driven economic growth.】

item.title: 中国数据疲软加深阴霾，石油跌至近六个月低点
item.description: 由于中国经济数据疲软，需求前景黯淡，石油跌至 9 月份以来的最低点附近。【原文：Oil fell to near the lowest since September as weak economic data from China compounded a dour outlook for demand.】

item.title: 前印度央行副行长称特朗普关税威胁可能对印度有利
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普威胁加征关税对印度经济来说并非全是坏消息，因为这促使印度政府降低贸易壁垒，从而刺激竞争和增长。【原文：US President Donald Trump’s threats to hike tariffs isn’t all bad news for India’s economy since it’s driving the government to lower trade barriers, which will spur competition and growth.】
